codeSystems.name: NGWardsCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Administrative Wards CS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem defines ward codes and names mapped to their respective Local Government Areas (LGAs) in Nigeria.

codeSystems.name: NigeriaAllergySeverityCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Reaction Severity CS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem captures the assessed severity of an allergic reaction following immunization.

codeSystems.name: NGClinicalStatusCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Adverse Event Clinical Status CS
codeSystems.description: A classification system that represents the current clinical status of an individual who experienced an Adverse Event Following Immunization (AEFI), based on medical observation, investigation, or follow-up assessment.

codeSystems.name: NGImmunizationContraindicationCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Vaccine contraindications CS
codeSystems.description: A set of standardized codes used to represent clinical conditions, diagnoses, or circumstances that serve as contraindications to the administration of one or more vaccines.

codeSystems.name: NGFacilityTypeCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Facility Type CS
codeSystems.description: A standardized classification system used to describe the type or level of health facility within a healthcare delivery system, based on the scope of services provided, staffing, infrastructure, and administrative role.

codeSystems.name: NGGenderCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Gender or Sex CS
codeSystems.description: Codes for the administrative gender or sex of a person, used in demographic and administrative contexts.

codeSystems.name: NGHivStatusCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Client HIV status CS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem defines list of options for HIV status of a Client

codeSystems.name: NGImmunizationSiteCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Vaccine Site CS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem captures the specific anatomical location on the patientâ€™s body where a vaccine was administered.

codeSystems.name: NGLGAsCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm LGAs in Nigeria CS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem defines LGA codes and names mapped to their respective States in Nigeria.

codeSystems.name: NGPregnancyStatusCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Client Pregnancy status CS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem defines list of options for Pregnancy status of a Client

codeSystems.name: NGImmunizationSessionTypeCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Immunization Session types CS
codeSystems.description: A standardized classification of vaccine types administered for the prevention of specific diseases, identified by the antigen or disease target (e.g., BCG, HepB, OPV, Pentavalent, MR).

codeSystems.name: NGSiblingHealthStatusCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Sibling Health Status CS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem defines list of relationships that a part of this IG

codeSystems.name: NGStatesCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm States in Nigeria CS
codeSystems.description: This CodeSystem defines ward codes and names mapped to their respective States in Nigeria.

codeSystems.name: NGVaccineLibraryCS
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Vaccine Library with SNOMED CT codes
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem for IMMZ.Z Vaccine Library Data Elements supported by this IG using SNOMED CT codes

codeSystems.name: NigeriaStockData
codeSystems.title: NG-Imm Stock Management Data Elements CS
codeSystems.description: CodeSystem for Stock Management Data Elements
